Horsemeadow_currPerformance_tt: Current maximum outcome of gene points. Depends on the number of horses in the meadow.
Horsemeadow_fullLoveMeter_tt: You can breed your horse now!
Horsemeadow_helpDialog10_copy: If there are not enough horses on the meadow, you cannot get the full 100 points per wheel section. In this case, ask cooperative friends to send more horses.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog10_title: What is the gene performance of the horse meadow?
Horsemeadow_helpDialog11_copy:
Every horse that comes from your stable starts with generation 0. Each horse that has been bred on the horse meadow increases by 1 generation.
Example: The child of Goldy (0) is 1st generation. If you send this horse (1) to the horse meadow, its foal will be 2nd generation, and so on. The higher the generation, the longer you need to do activities with your horse.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog12_copy: Good news: nothing happens. The other horse stays on the horse meadow until its owner has bred their own horse.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog12_title: What happens to the breeding partner once I have bred a new horse?
Horsemeadow_helpDialog13_copy: The meadow allows you to access and improve all six breeding effects. If your horse owns the same effect multiple times, then the meadow calculates only one effect that contains all values.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog13_title: What happens to my horse's regular breeding effects while on the meadow?
Horsemeadow_helpDialog14_copy: The meadow effects are a completely separate breeding effect set. The inheritance works exactly as the inheritance of regular effects.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog14_title: What happens with the meadow breeding effects when my new horse has moved back to the horse stable?
Horsemeadow_helpDialog1_copy: On the meadow, you can breed horses together with your cooperative friends. Each member can send one horse to the meadow. Then you can try to find a suitable horse as a breeding partner. With a little bit of luck, you can get a better horse through breeding. It is also possible to create new breeding effects.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog1_title: What is the cooperative horse meadow?
Horsemeadow_helpDialog2_copy:
Send one of your horses to the horse meadow - its horsebox in the stable will be locked until it comes back or has successfully bred. Now you have to get your horse ready for breeding by doing activities and caring for it. There are 10 different horse activities, and for each activity you will get some breeding hearts. Once you have collected a certain amount of hearts and have filled up the love meter, you can start to breed.
The number of hearts you can get for each horse activity depends on the order in which you complete the activities. Some activities are more useful at night, others during day. Use the activity history to find out what the best combination of activities is.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog2_title: What do I have to do?
Horsemeadow_helpDialog3_copy: When the love meter is full, you can try to find a partner for your horse. You will get 3 random suggestions from your coopertive friends' horses. You can select them in the top right corner of the screen. The best partner for your horse is always a horse that contains the same basic attributes, the same breeding effects, and a similar breeding value to your own horse. If the first horses offered are not suitable, you can pay some village dollars to get the next 3 suggestions.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog3_title: The love meter is full. What comes next?
Horsemeadow_helpDialog4_copy:
This is the talent wheel. It contains 9 sections that represent each of the possible basic attributes and breeding effects of a horse. In the center, you see your own horse.
When the love meter is full, the 3 clock hands point to which attributes or breeding effects would be improved if you bred at that moment. Each section is divided into 4 cells. The more cells that are active (per section), the more your horse and its breeding partner resemble each other, and the better the result will be. For each matching clock hand, you will get up to 50 genes, depending on the similarity of the attributes or breeding effects. If both horses (yours and the breeding partner) have the same type of attributes or breeding effects, these attributes or breeding effects will get double the genes. The higher the number of genes, the higher the chance of producing a better foal.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog4_title: What is the big circle in the center of the screen?
Horsemeadow_helpDialog5_copy:
On the left side of screen you can switch to the gene distribution panel. Here you can see the 3 selected attributes/breeding effects shown by the clock hands. The potential foal will get all the stats of your old horse plus these upgraded attributes/breeding effects. But first you have to distribute the genes between the corresponding attributes/breeding effects. 
Just use the sliders to increase or decrease the chance of getting the corresponding attribute or breeding effect improvement. If neither horse has a specific breeding effect, then that breeding effect is disabled, meaning that the foal cannot get it. When you are finished, you have to click the 'Breed' button below the sliders. The newly bred horse will be available immediately.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog6_copy:
There are 3 options: Ask your cooperative friends for horses. The more horses on the meadow, the easier it is to find a suitable partner.
Alternatively, you can do more activities with your horse instead of breeding immediately. In this case, you will have to charge the love meter again to be able to breed, however you get the chance to have a better clock hand selection. You can charge the love meter up to 27 times. Each time, one cell of the wheel will be activated, independent of the horse attributes. This way you can improve your results. Additionally, you will get genes for each section selected by the clock hands during a breeding opportunity. This way it becomes easier to get a high number of genes after each round, whereby the total number of genes per section is 100. The third option for finding a suitable partner is to ask Rose McLundy to catch a suitable wild horse form the prairie behind the horse ranch.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog6_title: I don't like the current clock hand selection of attributes/breeding effects. What can I do?
Horsemeadow_helpDialog7_copy: She is a real horse whisperer and able to catch exactly the horse that you want. When you have the chance to breed, you have to click the button in the bottom right corner. She will make a suggestion based on the current clock hands selection. You can then configure the attributes or breeding effects on the right side of screen for the best outcome. You can also turn the wheel to get different clock hand selections.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog8_copy: Each horse that you send to horse meadow will stay for at least one week. Your horse will stay on the horse meadow as long as you continue to do activities with it. If you don't do any activities for a week, it automatically moves back to your stables.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog8_title: How can I get my horse back from the horse meadow?
Horsemeadow_helpDialog9_copy: Initally, the condition of horses on the horse meadow are restricted. With each upgrade level, you increase the max. number of horses on the meadow, the breeding value, the breeding quality level, and the number of breeding effects that a meadow horse can have.
Horsemeadow_helpDialog9_title: What happens when you upgrade the horse meadow?

LTE_activityReward_copy: Congratulations! You have earned enough points and unlocked this great reward! Keep collecting points and earn more rewards.
LTE_coopPoints_tt: Cooperative points: Earned by harvesting edge plants, producing goods in your cooperative village, playing missions, or collecting from the cooperative tree.
LTE_farmPoints_tt: Farm points: Earned by producing goods or harvesting on your main, gourmet and flower farm and harvesting from the greenhouse
LTE_fishingPoints_tt: Fishing points: Earned by fishing, deep sea fishing, sending Oleg to train or fish, producing goods in the dockyard, or preparing meals in the Mermaid Bay.
LTE_helpDialog1_copy:
You can earn points in the following ways:

Farm points: By producing goods or harvesting on your main, gourmet and flower farm, or harvesting from the greenhouse.

Cooperative points: By harvesting edge plants, producing goods in your cooperative village, playing missions, or collecting from the cooperative tree.

Fishing points: By fishing, deep sea fishing, sending Oleg to train or fish, producing goods in the dockyard, or perparing meals in the Mermaid Bay.

Horse points: By training your horse, winning tournament challenges, using activity items in the cooperative horse meadow, or completing crates for Barnacle's ship.

Event points: By completing quests in theme events, or playing event farms
LTE_helpDialog2_copy:
Collect the different points to earn hard work rewards.

Be sure to take part in all activities to earn the most rewards! Remember, the first range of rewards is always easier to obtain.
LTE_helpDialog3_copy: Your master points are the sum of all the points you have collected during all the activities.
LTE_helpDialog4_copy: The server wide rankings are based on the total number of master points earned.
LTE_helpDialog5_copy:
You will receive an in-game message every Friday that shows you which server has collected the most points. Championship coins that can be spent at the Special trader will be rewarded to high ranking players and players belonging to high ranking servers.

At the end of event the top 3 servers will receive a special session with Steve Screwdriver!
LTE_helpDialogMain_copy: Gather points by taking part in different activities and use them to prove yourself as the best farmer in the world!
LTE_horsePoints_tt: Horse points: Earned by training your horse, winning tournament challenges, using activity items in the cooperative horse meadow, or completing crates for Barnacle's ship.
LTE_rankingNoReward_copy: You worked hard, but your rank was not high enough for you to receive a reward.
LTE_rankingReward_copy: Great job, you have reached rank {0} and earned this reward!
LTE_rewardSummary_checkBox: Don't show this summary in the future
LTE_rewardSummary_copy: These are the rewards you earned and have been credited in the Worldwide Championship since you checked last. Keep up the good work!
LTE_teaser_helpContent: All points earned during the Worldwide championship will be counted. The score of all participating players from each server will be used to determine that server's score. All the players from the top servers will receive a cool in-game reward, and a special visit from Steve Screwdriver. Each Friday, all players will receive a message informing them about the server rankings, while additional information will also be available in our forums.

LTE_themePoints_tt: Event points: Earned by completing tasks in theme events, or playing event farms.

LinkBuilding_cityhall_desc: Here you can see an overview of your cooperative, including its description, level, and stats. Together we can achieve more than we ever imagined!
LinkBuilding_cornstatue_desc: Here you can find the stats and scores of your cooperative and all cooperatives and players in the game. How do you stack up?
LinkBuilding_postoffice_desc: Here you can read your messages and contact your friends and other players in the game. Who doesn't love seeing that white envelope just waiting to be opened?
LinkBuilding_projectoffice_desc: Here you can see an overview of your cooperative projects. Fulfill the objectives to earn cooperative points and increase your cooperative level. Alone we are strong, but together we are stronger!
LinkBuilding_researchlab_desc: Here you can see your cooperative's research. If you get enough cooperative members to participate, you can research new advantages for everyone. Knowledge is how we grow!
LinkBuilding_villageFair_desc: When the Village Fair is in town, you and your cooperative can take on challenges based on the other competing cooperatives’ strengths and weaknesses. Produce as many of the requested products as you can to earn challenge points and win fantastic rewards.
LinkBuilding_villageLeague_desc:
This is where cooperatives can participate in the great village league. You and your cooperative can start a competition any time you want to try and reach the next spot in the ranking. 
You can also gain lots of achievements to get as many village medals as possible and be in with a chance of winning huge prizes every week!

NBFactory_FarmLaboratory0_desc: The farm laboratory lets you unlock new recipes for special products that help you build up your farm even faster. Build the farm laboratory to get started. The higher you upgrade it, the better the results!
NBFactory_FarmLaboratoryBonus_tt: Unlocks new products and reduces the number of the items required for production
NBFactory_FarmLaboratory_desc: It's a lot of work keeping up with a farm growing as fast as yours! Here you can make special products out of your regular products. This saves space and boosts your production all at the same time!

Persona_F55_Hint: Please select all answers that apply
Persona_F55_Q: Do you use media libraries or streaming services?
Persona_F5_A1: If the same processes are repeated over and over again
Persona_F5_A2: If the game doesn't offer anything new
Persona_F5_A3: If I frequently have to wait for something and can't do anything else in the meantime
Persona_F5_A4: If I get the feeling that I can't make any more progress in the game, or can only progress very slowly, if I don't pay real money
Persona_F5_A5: If I don't feel challenged in the game
Persona_F5_A6: If I lose something in the game that I invested a lot of time and money into
Persona_F5_A7: If I can't make reasonable progress in the game anymore
Persona_F5_A8: If the game is having technical issues
Persona_F5_Q: What bothers you about Big Farm (or would bother you)?
Persona_F60_Q:
All done! Thank you for taking the time for this survey!
Did you feel like anything was missing from it or is there anything else that you would like to tell us?
Persona_F61_Q: Would you be interested in participating in more surveys in the future to help us better adapt the game to your needs?
Persona_F6_A10: Influencing the development of my cooperative (or alliance in other games) is important to me
Persona_F6_A3: I try to complete (almost) all tasks (quests)
Persona_F6_A4: I compare my farm to other farms
Persona_F6_A5: I've seen something on another farm that I then also wanted to have
Persona_F6_A6: I have the same chance in the game as the other players
Persona_F6_A8: I'd like everything in the game to be clearly explained to me from the start
Persona_F6_A9: I want to be one of the best
Persona_F6_AS1: Doesn't apply to me at all
Persona_F6_Q: With Big Farm in mind, to what extent do the following statements apply to you?
Persona_F8_Q: How much time do you feel like you spend playing Big Farm?
Persona_F9_A1: I log in at specific times, for example to complete an event
Persona_F9_A2: I log in when I'm reminded to (e.g. in an email)
Persona_F9_A3: Sometimes I feel like others need me to play even though I don't want to (e.g. my friends, cooperative)
Persona_F9_AS1: Doesn't apply to me at all
Persona_F9_Q: To what extent do the following statements apply to you in regard to how you play Big Farm?
PoWebsiteCoop_desc: Thanks for being part of Big Farm, here are some items to help you out with your Cooperative Village.
PoWebsiteOktoberfest_desc: Thanks for joining us during our Oktoberfest event. Please accept this welcome gift to help you get started. Happy farming!
PoWebsite_desc: Thanks for joining Big Farm! Please accept this welcome gift to help you get started. Happy farming!
PoWebsite_title: A Big Welcome to Big Farm
Presentreceived_copy: Your welcome gift of {0} gold, {1} dollars, and the {2} decoration was added to your account.
Presentreceived_copy2: Please note: it can take a few minutes to receive the email. If it is also not in your spam folder, then our support will gladly help out.
PresentreminderDialog_copy1:
You have a welcome gift of {0} gold and {1} dollars waiting for you.
To collect it, just enter your email address here and click on the link in the welcome email.
PresentreminderDialog_copy2: You can also request the email to be sent to you again.
PresentreminderDialog_copy3: Note: the email address you enter here will also become the email address with which you can log into the game (in addition to your player name).

Can't hand over yet.

QuestPanel_clickquestmenu: Click to open the farm selection menu
QuestPanel_noquest: No tasks left on this farm
QuestRewardDialog_BennyP_ProjectSquidgoa: Wow! These fish look delicious! I'll cook them with some koality potat... I mean, I'll eat them raw! Obviously us pandas can't cook, silly!

Gosh, what an unbearably grizzly smell! Here, take some of my old tools as a thank you. Not all of it, though! Some of my equipment would be too dangerous in your hands, only a real panda knows how to exercise the right to bear arms!
QuestRewardDialog_Benny_ProjectSquidgoal: Haha, April Fools'! It was me all along! Watching you fetch me all those things was so beary funny! Now use these to trick your friends like I tricked you!
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_DanielBuyUseIte: See? It always takes the right resources to succeed! Always a pleasure to help!
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_DanielDonateFis: Great job! I'll see if I can get you an invitation for the opening evening!
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_DanielFish1_cop: You're always so hard at work. Just wait and see, all that practice will pay off!
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_DanielFish2_cop: Good job! Think about the possibilities if we caught one hundred times more ... we could export it across the world!
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_Millstack_1_1_c: Production is running smoother already! Upgrading the mill to higher levels is even more efficient since then you can produce even more batches of feed at once.
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_Story1_4_copy: Hey, it looks like our first investment has paid off! Peter managed to make the chicken farm a success. He's promised to do the same for us if we ever need any help.
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_Story3_5_copy:
Terrific.
I'll commission market research to find out what the effects of our investment were.
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_Story4_2_copy: Our Smiley Meals are selling like hot cakes and must have been quite the treat for your taste buds - the plates are all empty! Now who's doing the dishes?
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_Story6_1_copy: The cook is thrilled! With ingredients as fresh as these, he can whip up a delicious main course. Preparations are already underway.
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_Story7_3_copy: That was definitely worth it. I'll quit my job if you don't get anything out of this in the long run.
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_Story8_5_copy: That looks good! I took the liberty of including business cards with the packages, so the parents know who to contact for orders.
QuestRewardDialog_Daniel_copy: My dad will be proud of us!
QuestRewardDialog_George_GeorgeDonateCat: Well, it turns out that catfish don't scare the mice away after all. But cats do! The fish attracted all the neighborhood cats. I've never seen anything like it!
QuestRewardDialog_George_GeorgeDonateFis: Farming was and always will be my first and last love! Fishing is fun, but I'm not made for the water. I'm a typical landlubber!
QuestRewardDialog_George_GeorgeFish1_cop: I can't believe it! It looks like some kind of alien! But what is the big head for? Maybe it stores water in there like a camel.
QuestRewardDialog_George_Mine1_1_copy:
Shiny little stones, superb!
... Did you also see the golden glint further down the mine shaft?
QuestRewardDialog_George_Mine1_2_copy: Well done! I almost feel like I did during the Klondike gold rush!
QuestRewardDialog_George_Mine1_3_copy: Great! You're getting out more gold than you put in. That was the most important lesson I learned back in the Klondike.
QuestRewardDialog_George_Story1_1_copy: Well, I hope that helped him. He said it did, anyway. But let's see when he'll ask for help again.
QuestRewardDialog_George_Story2_2_copy:
Why all the celebrations? 
Back in the day we only had Christmas! I always got a new shovel under the tree.
By the look of things, you've got lots more than that these days.
QuestRewardDialog_George_Story3_3_copy: Phew! That was a close call. The pigs are gone. But for how long, I wonder...?
QuestRewardDialog_George_Story5_4_copy:
An apple a day keeps the doctor away. 
Or so the saying goes. I prefer to say that a slice of bacon a day keeps the pigs away!
QuestRewardDialog_George_Story6_5_copy: The auction raised quite a lot of money, and the banquet was a complete success as well. It's smiles all round in the pictures in the Racing Farmer. A complete success!
QuestRewardDialog_George_Story8_3_copy: Well, we did it better, but parents don't teach kids anything useful these days. Just math and all that theoretical stuff. Who needs that kind of thing anyway?
QuestRewardDialog_George_Story8_4_copy: Now they know how much better off they are without the taste of chemicals. That was hard work ... I'll just rest my eyes for a minute... zzzz.
QuestRewardDialog_George_copy: Oh, how nice. Let's drink a fine glass of beetroot juice to that.
QuestRewardDialog_Lester_LesterDonateCar: Well, well. That was faster than expected! Maybe you should spend more time fishing and less time farming ... I could always take over the farm so you have more time for your new hobby. What do you think?
QuestRewardDialog_Lester_Story1_3_copy: Pfft, no matter how much you help, it isn't going to get any better. You're just delaying the inevitable. But go ahead and ruin yourself, it's all the same to me.
QuestRewardDialog_Lester_Story3_1_copy:
Bob won't stop pestering you any time soon. 
Once you start helping, it's not easy to stop. That's why I ignore things like that.
QuestRewardDialog_Lester_Story4_3_copy: I really don't get why everyone's making such a fuss about those splotches they call art. Plants belong on the fields or in the barn, not on paper...
QuestRewardDialog_Lester_Story5_3_copy:
Indeed, your apples do not appear to be poisoned like Snow White's. 
But never say never.
However, a good deed will not go unrewarded.
QuestRewardDialog_Lester_Story7_2_copy: Lucky. Looks like my ... er ... YOUR farm's soil is pretty resilient.
QuestRewardDialog_Lester_copy: That worked better than I thought it would...
QuestRewardDialog_Lilly_copy: You're a natural. The spirits feel it too...
QuestRewardDialog_Matilda_copy: Very nice. I couldn't have done it better myself. One just has to have a little bit of confidence in young people nowadays!
QuestRewardDialog_Monica_MonicaFishBass_: Look at you! You're already as good as all these pro athletes, except you're a pro fisher!
QuestRewardDialog_OlegBuyBoat__copy: Now, that's a fine vessel if I ever did see one! Any deckhand worth his salt would be proud to sail on a ship like that.
QuestRewardDialog_OlegBuyBoats_copy: That's quite the fleet you've built there, young farmer. You look set to conquer the seven seas now.
QuestRewardDialog_OlegBuySonar_copy: Poseidon himself couldn't take down this fleet! Great work.
QuestRewardDialog_OlegFishHerring_copy: Great work! There'll be no empty plates at supper time this evening.
QuestRewardDialog_OlegFishLobsters_copy: Wonderful! Everyone at the banquet will be talking about my platter for years to come!
QuestRewardDialog_OlegFishSalmon_copy: Incredible! The fishmonger will be thrilled when he sees what we have caught for him!
QuestRewardDialog_OlegFishSwordfish_copy: Not only have you mastered deep sea fishing, but you have also helped me prepare a banquet that will be talked about for years to come! Thank you so much for your help. As I've said before: Fishermen always pay their debts, so here's a reward for your efforts.
QuestRewardDialog_OlegHireDesckHands_cop: Even the most experienced fishermen need a helping hand when out at sea. A good set of deckhands can keep your boat running ship-shape!
QuestRewardDialog_OlegMakeChowder_copy: Want to know how you tell if your bait is good? Give it a sniff; if it makes you feel like passing out, you know it's good to go!
QuestRewardDialog_OlegNameBoat_copy: I remember the name of my first boat. It was Janice, she was beautiful... until she sank, of course. But that's another story!
QuestRewardDialog_Oleg_OlegBuyFishingGea: Good to see you're following my tips! You'll see how easy fishing can be with the right equipment!
QuestRewardDialog_Oleg_OlegBuyItem_copy: Good gear gives you a sense confidence, don't you think? Good fishing!
QuestRewardDialog_Oleg_OlegBuyUseItem2_c: It's like breadcrumbs for ducks, right? Haha!
QuestRewardDialog_Oleg_OlegBuyUseItem3_c: See? It always takes the right resources to succeed! Always a pleasure to help!
QuestRewardDialog_Oleg_OlegBuyUseItem_co: So, what do you think? If you're ever feeling lazy, just use these baits. It makes everything much easier!
QuestRewardDialog_Oleg_OlegDonate_copy: Hooray! I can't believe you managed to rebuild my pole! My father would be proud of you. It's almost as good as my old one. Thank you very much! Now I can finally go fish again!
QuestRewardDialog_Oleg_OlegFish_produce_: I may be old, but I've still got it! I can still remember my first big catch when I was a little boy. I always practiced in the bathtub with Silvy and my toy pole.
QuestRewardDialog_Oleg_OlegGame_copy: Wow! That was a great first try. Practice a little bit more, and soon you can catch the fish with your eyes closed!
QuestRewardDialog_Oleg_OlegIntro1_copy: Hooray! I'm glad you've offered to help me out. It's good that I landed near your farm - that Lester guy next door seems like a real sour pickerel!
QuestRewardDialog_Oleg_OlegTrain_copy: I knew you would be a quick learner! Memorizing all of this stuff can be tough, but once you get the knack, fishing will be easier than breathing!
QuestRewardDialog_Rita_RitaDonateFish1_c: Great! There's nothing else standing in the way of the grand opening. Good job!
QuestRewardDialog_Rita_RitaDonateFish2_c: Fantastic! Now I have to figure out how I get the fish into that rectangular shape...
QuestRewardDialog_Rita_Story2_1_copy:
Oh, how beautiful. The girls will love all those colorful flowers. 
The celebration will be sensational, I can feel it.
QuestRewardDialog_Rita_Story2_3_copy:
Marvelous. 
The celebration will be wonderful. Here's to my organizational skills and your help, of course.
QuestRewardDialog_Rita_Story2_4_copy:
Chocolate, vanilla, strawberry... I can never decide which one is my favorite.
Thanks to your generosity, all scoops are on the house.
QuestRewardDialog_Rita_Story3_4_copy: Wow, generosity like that calls for a reward. I'll put you on the cover of the Racing Farmer.
QuestRewardDialog_Rita_Story4_1_copy: What a success! Isn't watching happy children reward enough? I'll take a picture right away and write an article about your help. Readers love these kind of stories!
QuestRewardDialog_Rita_Story5_2_copy:
Oh, how wonderful. 
I'll feature you on the front page as the top benefactor! You'll have new customers beating down your door in no time.
QuestRewardDialog_Rita_Story6_3_copy: My readers always like charity! Mmm, that apple pie smells so delicious and goes perfectly with a nice cup of coffee.
QuestRewardDialog_Rita_Story8_1_copy: What beautiful photos! That's all I need for my article. I'll head to the editorial office right away and prepare everything for tomorrow's issue of the Racing Farmer.
QuestRewardDialog_Rita_copy: Would you mind if I wrote a teensy-weensy article about it?
QuestRewardDialog_TessaFish_copy: Wow, preparations for the banquet are off to a great start! We'll make a sea captain out of you yet!
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_DecoTower1_1_cop: Isn't it great to walk around the decoration collection looking at everything? I can't wait for you to complete your collection!
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_IntroTheater1_co: Act one: The farmer's daughter and the broker's son meet for the first time. She doesn't like him very much because he seems very snobby. However, the boy starts liking the girl since she's not like all the other spoiled girls he knows.
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_OlegFish_copy: I may be old, but I've still got it! I can still remember my first big catch when I was a little boy. I always practiced in the bathtub with Silvy and my toy pole.
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Story1_2_copy: Say, is Peter afraid of chickens? I suppose there's still time. At least he's gotten better with them - thanks to you.
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Story2_5_copy:
Pigs, ice cream, and flowers. Sounds like a great party. 
I'll tell Rita we're all set. Here's to you and your help!
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Story3_2_copy: We have the feed. Now all we need are little piglets to feed. It's all a bit like having kids, don't you think?
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Story4_4_copy: Perfect timing! Mmm, can you smell the fresh bread? Just like at my grandparents' place. The cook said she would make some extra for us, too!
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Story5_1_copy: Hooray, the fertilizer has been produced and is ready for use. Let's see what's next.
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Story6_2_copy: Delicious! Wait and see if the side dishes don't steal the show from the main dish. Either way, the vegetarians definitely won't go hungry.
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Story6_4_copy: Good work! The room looks much nicer now. Dinner is ready and the guests should be arriving soon - let's get started!
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Story7_1_copy:
Mmm, delicious. There's nothing like fresh milk straight from a cow. 
What? What are you looking at?
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Story7_4_copy: What did I tell you? Delicious, fruity, and not too sweet - exactly how a cherry cake should taste!
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Story8_2_copy: Everyone enjoyed that! The children were a little hesitant at first, but once a couple had plucked up the courage, you couldn't tear them away from the animals.
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_TessaDonateFish1: I hope I do everything right! It's not that easy to roll the rice into the nori without losing half of it!
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_TessaDonatePicke: Great! I hope I can convince her to buy her fish from the organic market the next time. It's worth it, even though she has to come all the way from the city.
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_TessaFish1_copy: Working hard feels good, right? I can sleep better at night knowing that I achieved something during the day!
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Theater2_copy: Act two: The girl and the boy get to know each other and the farmer's daughter realizes that the boy isn't as bad as she thought. They become friends and she shows him her world, but then her father recognizes the boy as the broker's son and tells him to leave.
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Theater3_copy: Act three: Even though her father forbade her from seeing the boy ever again, the farmer's daughter visited him in the big city. However, she slowly realized that she didn't fit into his world. Besides, his father didn't like her very much either and sadly, she decided to return home.
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_Theater4_copy: Act four: The broker's son goes to see the farmer's daughter but she doesn't want to listen to him - until her father shows up and tries to banish the boy. However, when the broker's son declares his love to the farmer's daughter, the farmer realizes that the pair belong together.
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_VickyDonateCarpB: Oh, how wonderful! You really saved the day! I'll make sure that the truck reaches the foster kittens this time!
QuestRewardDialog_Tessa_copy: Upgrading, harvesting, expanding. There's always something to do.
QuestRewardDialog_VickyFishShrimp_copy: You're a real natural at this. Thanks to you, my souffle is going to be a huge hit!
QuestRewardDialog_Vicky_Pet1_1_copy: Looking good! Your new friend will feel right at home in this doghouse.
QuestRewardDialog_Vicky_Pet1_2_copy: Sounds good! The more often you call your dog by name, the faster your bond will grow.
QuestRewardDialog_Vicky_Pet1_3_copy: Check out that shiny coat! This is certainly the result of great dog food!
QuestRewardDialog_Vicky_Pet1_4_copy: Just look how happy your dog is! The little guy learned a new trick right away. You'd better keep practicing!
QuestRewardDialog_copy: You get a reward for completing the task.

QuestTask_DanielFish2_harvest_bass_copy: My father has a giant pond full of bass. I fell in it once or twice when I was a kid!

QuestTask_DanielFish2_harvest_catfish_co: I thought about buying a catfish for my aquarium. What do you think?

QuestTask_DanielFish2_harvest_pickerel_c: I heard pickerels sell very well on the market at the moment.

QuestTask_FarmMachine1_1_finishMissions_: Getting a few certificates in the missions shouldn't be a problem for you, should it?
Click on the Search button to start a mission.
QuestTask_FarmMachine1_2_ownBooster_happ: Who would have thought that such a mighty machine was hiding under that old-fashioned exterior?
Open the garage menu and select the retro classic farm machine. Click on the Build button in the detail view to build the retro classic.
QuestTask_FarmMachine1_3_finishMissions_: Nothing is more important than the well-being of your workers – without that, nothing will work.
Click on the Search button in the missions panel to start a mission.
QuestTask_FarmMachine1_4_ownBooster_happ: Make sure you don't get your finger caught though.
Open the garage menu and select the retro classic. Click on the Upgrade button in the detail view to upgrade the retro classic.
Upgrade your retro classic to level 2!
QuestTask_FarmMachine1_5_ownBooster_MFst: The powerhouse is a tractor that increases the yield from your animal facilities. It has some serious power under the hood.
Production farm machines can be found in your garage under the Production Farm Machines tab.
QuestTask_FarmMachine1_6_finishMissions_: A certificate like this looks great framed and can be incredibly motivating.
You will receive reputation points and certificates for successfully completed missions. You need these for building and upgrading your farm machines.
QuestTask_FarmMachine1_7_activateFarmMac: Your farm workers are already quite excited about their new coworkers.
To activate a production farm machine, go to the garage and choose the farm machine you want under the Production Farm Machines tab by clicking on the Activate button.
Use the powerhouse on your farm!
QuestTask_GeorgeDonateCatfish_donate_cat: Did you ever hear that mice are afraid of fish? How curious!
You can use the boat to access the locations where this fish can be caught. You have to catch it yourself
QuestTask_GeorgeDonateFish1_donate_picke: I always forgot to stick a worm on the hook!
You can use the boat to access the locations where this fish can be caught. You have to catch it yourself
QuestTask_GeorgeDonateFish1_donate_sturg: I didn't even catch a shoe!

QuestTask_GeorgeFish1_harvest_dolphin_co: Do you think its head is so big because it has such a big brain?

QuestTask_IntroTheater1_donate_egg_copy: Hopefully they won't break the eggs on stage.
QuestTask_IntroTheater1_harvest_bass_cop: I really hope they cool the fish between the plays...

QuestTask_JimJackUFO_ThemeUfo_7_donate_w: Wax is produced in the apiary. It can be made into other items in the shop.

QuestTask_OlegBuyBoat_ownObject_motorboa: The waters around here are famed for their variety of fish, but if we are going to explore what the deep blue sea has to offer, we're going to need to invest in a boat!
Fishing boats can be purchased, upgraded, and renamed at the dockyard.
QuestTask_OlegBuyBoats_buyItem_runabout_: Silvy and I always dreamed of owning our own fleet of fishing boats. What young fisherman hasn't?

QuestTask_OlegBuySonar_buyItem_protectio: It's time to invest in some protection. We wouldn't want the sea to take away some of your precious cargo, would we!
Protective equipment protects your boat against the dangers of the sea. Different protective equipment provides protection against different dangers while your boat is out fishing.
QuestTask_OlegBuySonar_ownObject_protect: It's time to invest in some protection. We wouldn't want the sea to take away some of your precious cargo, would we!
Protective equipment protects your boat against the dangers of the sea. Different protective equipment provides protection against different dangers while your boat is out fishing.
QuestTask_OlegBuyUseItem2_buyItem_help: Visit the gear shop to buy this item
QuestTask_OlegBuyUseItem2_buyItem_sturge: Make sure to buy the right ones!
Go to the gear shop and buy the required item
Make sure to buy the right ones!
Go to the gear shop and buy the required item
QuestTask_OlegBuyUseItem2_ownObject_help: Visit the gear shop to buy this item
QuestTask_OlegBuyUseItem2_ownObject_stur: Make sure to buy the right ones!
Go to the gear shop and buy the required item
Make sure to buy the right ones!
Go to the gear shop and buy the required item

After a few seconds, the water will be swimming with sturgeon!
To use it, open the inventory dialog on the left while you are fishing, hover over the icon, and click the button
After a few seconds, the water will be swimming with sturgeon!
To use it, open the inventory dialog on the left while you are fishing, hover over the icon, and click the button
QuestTask_OlegBuyUseItem3_ownObject_heav: The best way to maximize your catch!
Visit the gear shop to buy this item
QuestTask_OlegBuyUseItem3_useIngredient_: It will be a great investment, trust me!
Use this item on your fishing trip
QuestTask_OlegBuyUseItem_buyItem_bassAdv: Bass are pretty easy to catch anyway...
Go to the gear shop and buy the required item
QuestTask_OlegBuyUseItem_buyItem_bassSim: Bass are pretty easy to catch anyway...
Go to the gear shop and buy the required item
QuestTask_OlegBuyUseItem_ownObject_bassA: Bass are pretty easy to catch anyway...
Go to the gear shop and buy the required item
QuestTask_OlegBuyUseItem_ownObject_bassS: Bass are pretty easy to catch anyway...
Go to the gear shop and buy the required item
QuestTask_OlegBuyUseItem_useIngredient_b: To use it, open the inventory dialog on the left while you are fishing, hover over the icon, and click the button
To use it, open the inventory dialog on the left while you are fishing, hover over the icon, and click the button
QuestTask_OlegDonate_donate_corn_copy: Did you know that corn stems are very sturdy? We can use them to stabilize the fixed fishing pole. My father taught me this when I was a little boy!
QuestTask_OlegDonate_donate_egg_copy: Egg yolks are a natural adhesive that would be perfect for holding together your fixed pole! Besides that, fish love the taste of eggs, making it excellent bait!
QuestTask_OlegDonate_donate_honey_copy: Honey is a natural adhesive that would be perfect for holding together your fixed pole! Besides that, fish love the sweet taste of honey, making it excellent bait!
QuestTask_OlegDonate_donate_lavender_cop: Did you know that lavender stems are very sturdy? We can use them to stabilize the fixed fishing pole. My father taught me this when I was a little boy!
QuestTask_OlegFishHerring_harvest_herrin: I always thought my first boat Janice sank because of a shark attack, but it turned out it was just a red herring.
Fish nets are the ideal equipment for catching herring.
QuestTask_OlegFishLobsters_harvest_lobst: We can't make a lobster risotto without some lobster now, can we!
Lobster cages are the ideal equipment for catching lobsters.
QuestTask_OlegFishSalmon_harvest_salmon_: Salmon can be slippery customers, but I'm sure a fisherman of your ability should have no trouble snagging some.
Trolling rods are the ideal equipment item for catching salmon.
QuestTask_OlegFishSwordfish_harvest_swor: Swordfish can only be found in the deepest of waters, but be careful out there! Although the deep seas offer rich rewards, the dangers afoot are equally as great!
Bent trolling rods are the ideal equipment for catching swordfish.
QuestTask_OlegFish_produce_bass: Tell Oleg to fish for bass
QuestTask_OlegFish_produce_bass_copy: I fished for so many bass when I was younger that now I could catch them in my sleep!
QuestTask_OlegFish_produce_bass_help: Tell Oleg to fish for {0} kg of bass. In order to do so, select Oleg and open the fishing menu.
QuestTask_OlegFish_produce_bass_title: Tell Oleg to fish for bass
QuestTask_OlegGame_clientAction_40_copy: Now we're getting down to business!
QuestTask_OlegGame_clientAction_40_help: Click on Oleg, then select the fishing pole to start your fishing trip.
QuestTask_OlegGame_copy: Now we're getting down to business!
QuestTask_OlegHireDesckHands_buyItem_pro: Different deckhands provide different bonuses, such as reducing your boat's travel time, reducing the time it takes to catch fish, and increasing the number of fish you can catch per hour.
Deckhands can be hired from the Dockyard.
QuestTask_OlegIntro1_clientAction_39: Hello, there! It seems like I've gotten myself into quite a predicament! I tried to catch a king-sized trout, but then I found a very angry shark on my fishhook instead! The beast managed to crash my boat against the pier and even broke my fishing gear!
QuestTask_OlegIntro1_clientAction_39_cop: You managed to find the old fisherman, now the adventure begins.
QuestTask_OlegIntro1_clientAction_39_hel: Find the old fisherman on your farm
QuestTask_OlegMakeChowder_harvest_chowde: Every self respecting fisherman should know how to make their own bait.
Bait reduces the time it takes to catch fish. Different types of bait can be used to catch different types of fish.
QuestTask_OlegNameBoat_nameBoat_copy: My father always told me it's bad luck to set sail on a boat with no name!
QuestTask_OlegNameBoat_nameBoat_help: You can rename your boat at the dockyard. The first name is free, but any later changes cost gold. Swear words are prohibited and may not be used.
QuestTask_OlegTrain_produce_FishermanXp_: Fishing isn't as easy as it seems! You have to pay attention to lots of things!
Click on Oleg, choose to send him fishing and open the Training tab to let him train you
QuestTask_ProjectSquidgoals_1_harvest_ba: I'd catch them myself but these bear paws of mine are made for climbing trees, not for fishing!
Click on Oleg, then select the fishing pole to start your fishing trip.
Catch me 30 kg of bass, human!
QuestTask_ProjectSquidgoals_2_donate_dun: Some say you can turn dung into gold, but helping a sad panda is way less teddyous!
Could I pawssibly ask for 100 pieces of dung?
QuestTask_ProjectSquidgoals_3_donate_cor: It would be really embearassing if you didn't know where to get some corn! The old man looked like he was furryious with me!
Quick, I really need those 50 units of corn
QuestTask_RitaDonateFish1_donate_bluefis: I bet these little guys will be fun to watch!
You can use the boat to access the locations where this fish can be caught. You have to catch it yourself
QuestTask_RitaDonateFish2_donate_bass_co: I heard it should have a delicious taste!
QuestTask_RitaDonateFish2_donate_bass_he: You can use the boat to access the locations where this fish can be caught. You have to catch it yourself
QuestTask_RitaDonateFish2_donate_bluefis: It harmonizes exquisitely with mashed potatoes and pickles!
You can use the boat to access the locations where this fish can be caught. You have to catch it yourself
QuestTask_ShinkeiEventVisitQuest_startEv: The wise master wishes to share his knowledge with farmers seeking wisdom. Visit the Shinkei Suijaku School to begin your training and win great rewards.
Visit the Shinkei-Suijaku School beside your farm to begin your training.
QuestTask_Ship1_donateToShip_copy: No risk of bringing down an albatross while we're still moored up here in the harbor.
QuestTask_Ship1_donateToShip_help: Click on the harbor to go to an overview of your loading docks. You can use the Donate button to load products onto the ship.
QuestTask_Ship1_donateToShip_title: Complete the shipload for a single product
QuestTask_Ship2_finishShip_copy: Off we go! So long as there's a breath of wind in the sails!
QuestTask_Ship2_finishShip_help: Click on the harbor to go to an overview of your loading docks. Provide all the required products to complete the shipload.
QuestTask_Story9_4_ownObject_desc: Let's enjoy the finer things in life. That's what they're there for, after all!
QuestTask_TessaDonateFish1_donate_bonito: I found a recipe for bonito sushi. I'm excited to try it!
You can find this fish on your flower farm
QuestTask_TessaDonateFish1_donate_sturge: Sturgeon caviar tastes incredibly good. You have to try it!
You can use the boat to access the locations where this fish can be caught. You have to catch it yourself
QuestTask_TessaDonatePickerel_donate_pic: Did you know that freshly caught fish doesn't smell that much like fish?
You can use the boat to access the locations where this fish can be caught. You have to catch it yourself
QuestTask_TessaFish1_harvest_bonito_copy: I've never seen you lazing around!
QuestTask_TessaFish1_harvest_bonito_help: You can find this fish on your flower farm
QuestTask_TessaFish1_harvest_catfish_cop: It's good to see that you're so ambitious!
QuestTask_TessaFish1_harvest_catfish_hel: You can use the boat to access the locations where this fish can be caught. You have to catch it yourself
QuestTask_TessaFish_activateBuilding_cop: Let's put your sea legs to the test! I'll show you a great spot I discovered that is teeming with fish.
QuestTask_TessaFish_activateBuilding_hel: Find a suitable fishing location and deploy one of your boats.
QuestTask_TessaFish_activateBuilding_tit: Send your boat out to fish!
QuestTask_Theater2_harvest_milk_copy: I wonder if they'll have a real cow on stage?
QuestTask_Theater3_harvest_wheat_copy: Imagine how great the stage decoration will look like with these props!
QuestTask_Theater4_donate_apple_copy: Do you think they will eat the apples after the last play?
QuestTask_Theater4_harvest_bluefish_copy: I overheard that one actor will get slapped in the face with a fish!
QuestTask_Theater4_harvest_bluefish_help: You can use the boat to access the locations where this fish can be caught. You have to catch it yourself
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_10_harvest_lambslet: I don't have any four leaf clovers, and a rabbit's foot seems a bit cruel. But some lamb's lettuce looks a bit like a clover - that will do the trick! Can you help me gather some?
Harvest lamb's lettuce from your gardens
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_11_harvest_honey_co: Who doesn't like a spoonful of honey in their tea? Erm, I forgot my bee keeper's outfit, maybe you could collect some for me?
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_11_harvest_honey_he: Harvest honey from the apiary on your flower farm
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_11_harvest_inkPaint: I felt bad so I tried helping collect some honey. Problem is, I was looking at Daniel's ink drawings at the time and in my surprise I might have dropped them... All of them... Could you help me get them back?
You can find Japanese ink wash paintings when collecting from the fields and stables on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_12_harvest_aloevera: Daniel will need a little something to protect him from dragon's breath. Some aloe vera gel might help sooth any burns he might suffer.
Harvest aloe vera gel from your distillery
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_13_harvest_almonds_: The cranes are lovely, I'm sure he'll really appreciate them. But you know what always sweetens me up? Sugared almonds! Can you help me gather some?
Harvest almonds from your orchard on the gourmet farm
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_13_harvest_origamiC: When Daniel wanted to make his friend Takeshi feel better, he collected some origami cranes for him. Perhaps a similar gesture would make up for everything.
You can find origami cranes when harvesting and producing on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_5_harvest_pig_copy: Breed {0} pigs on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_5_harvest_pig_help: Breed {0} pigs on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_7_harvest_milk_copy: Daniel will need a local gift to take with him. Our cows produce the best milk I ever tasted, and it's been a while since I did any farm work. Roll up your sleeves and help me milk these cows!
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_7_harvest_milk_help: Harvest milk from your cowshed or goat stable
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_8_harvest_cherryBlo: Now for the final part of the recipe. I knew Daniel had some blossoms so I thought I would borrow some extra. I learned an important lesson though; the arrows they put on boxes... they tell you where the bottom isn't!
You can find cherry blossoms when collecting from the orchards on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_8_harvest_dung_copy: When you're covered in dung, there's no better solution than... dung! It's part of an old recipe my grandpappy taught me. Will you help me gather the ingredients?
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_8_harvest_dung_help: Harvest dung from the animals on your farm
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_9_harvest_wax_copy: Hmm, these are pretty comfy once you get used to them, but I think I'll stick to my slippers. Let's gather some wax and smooth these out for Daniel's trip.
QuestTask_ThemeAsian_9_harvest_wax_help: Harvest wax from the apiary on your flower farm
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_10_harvest_bass_c: I once taught Oleg how to improve his fishing skills. It's all about channeling positive energy - it attracts fish better than any bait.
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_10_harvest_bass_h: Catch, or have Oleg catch, some bass
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_11_harvest_corn_c: Wow, you made a great job building that campfire. The flames look so magical in the starlight. All we need now is some fresh popcorn to really set the scene!
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_11_harvest_corn_h: Harvest corn from the fields on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_11_harvest_firewo: Make sure the wood is nice and dry. There's something so spiritual about a roaring campfire, don't you think?
You can find firewood when harvesting the orchards on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_12_harvest_honeyd: Bees love anything sweet and sticky - maybe we can find something to take their attention away from the tent.
Harvest honeydew from the orchards on your flower farm
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_13_harvest_vanill: Being lost in the woods makes you appreciate the important things in life. Friends, family... ice cream! Let me thank you for coming to my rescue by treating you to a tub of my famous home-made ice cream back at the farm!
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_7_harvest_jasmine: Looks like Tessa's late - that's not like her at all! Oh well, let's collect some jasmine while we wait. My ancestors believed that jasmine helps keep a clear mind when exploring the wild.
Harvest jasmine from the meadows on your flower farm
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_7_harvest_tracks_: Take a look at this: It's Tessa's hat. I found it while we were gathering jasmine! There's no sign of Tessa though. Let's look around for clues.
You can find tracks when harvesting the fields on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_8_harvest_apple_c: Red apples would be a great addition for our rucksacks! Not only are they delicious, but we can use their seeds to leave a trail back to the farm - just like Hansel and Gretel!
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_8_harvest_apple_h: Harvest apples from orchards on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_9_harvest_honey_c: No bear can resist a pawful of yummy, runny honey!
QuestTask_ThemeCamping_9_harvest_mapPart: That honey should keep the bear occupied for long enough for us to search his den. Maybe we'll find some clues that will lead us to Tessa.
You can find map pieces when harvesting and producing on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeFairytale_10_harvest_hone: Oh no! The glass slippers I made are too small! Urgh, my feet are stuck. Maybe a little lotion will help.
Produce honey cream in the flower shop
QuestTask_ThemeFairytale_11_harvest_jasm: Jasmine is the perfect stage decoration for a fairytale play. It looks great and smells fantastic - audiences will love it!
Harvest jasmine from the meadows on your flower farm
QuestTask_ThemeFairytale_12_harvest_jasm: No prince can resist the scent of a fragrant perfume, not even if that prince is a frog!
Harvest essence of jasmine from your distillery
QuestTask_ThemeFairytale_13_harvest_fire: I noticed your farm has been attracting a lot of fire flies this season. All we need to do use the honey you harvested to entice them into these jars and voila! Natural stage lighting!
You can find fireflies when harvesting and producing on your main farm.
QuestTask_ThemeFairytale_13_harvest_hone: We don't need electricity to light our stage, all we need is a little creativity and a touch of magic. Farmer, could you help me gather some honey?
QuestTask_ThemeFairytale_7_harvest_apple: I don't know what it is, but there's just something about fairytales that make me want to stuff my face with apples! I guess I don't need to worry about the apples on Big Farm being cursed by a witch!
Harvest apples from orchards on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeFairytale_7_harvest_story: Look what I found! It's another page of the fairytale! I wonder if there are any more lying around. Perhaps we can find enough to put on our own play!
You can find storybook pages when collecting from the stables on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeFairytale_8_harvest_bread: We need a white feather for our brave Knight's helmet. For that, we're going to need ducks, and if there is one thing I know about ducks, it's that they're suckers for bread crumbs!
You can find breadcrumbs when harvesting the fields and orchards on your main farm.
QuestTask_ThemeFairytale_8_harvest_egg_c: Now we have our costume, we need someone to play the part of the brave and handsome knight. Sounds like a job for Benny! I'll bake him a cake to make sure he says yes!
QuestTask_ThemeFairytale_9_harvest_almon: When I was a little girl, my mother and I painted almonds and pretended they were precious gems for our cake decorations. I bet we can do the same now!
Harvest almonds from orchards on your gourmet farm
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_10_harvest_wax_cop: Benny has dozens of old surf boards locked away in his storage shed. They all look a little well-used, but it's nothing a bit of wax can't smooth over!
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_11_harvest_carp_co: The fish in Hawaii may be delicious, but I don't think anything compares to what we have here on the farm!
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_11_harvest_carp_he: Catch, or have Oleg catch, some carp
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_12_harvest_coconut: Coconut milk is sure to put everyone in a Hawaiian mood! I've never tried it myself, but I know that Benny loves it.
Coconuts can be found when harvesting and producing on your main farm.
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_12_harvest_milk_co: Yuk! Maybe coconut milk is something you grow up to like, but for the time being I think Shelly and I will stick to regular milk!
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_12_harvest_milk_he: Harvest milk from your cowshed or goat stable
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_13_harvest_oliveoi: Fresh oysters drizzled with olive oil, no one will be able to resist.
Produce olive oil in your distillery
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_7_harvest_peaches_: If there is one thing I know about Benny, it's that he loves peaches. Could you help me gather some for him?
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_8_harvest_egg_copy: All this party planning is making Shelly hungry. I think she needs some protein. Farmer, could you gather some eggs for a hungry turtle?
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_8_harvest_flowerPe: Tiki statues will really add a touch of authentic Hawaiian flair to our luau, and we can make flowery necklaces for them to wear!
You can find flower blossoms when harvesting and producing on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_9_harvest_lavender: Lilly once told me that the smell of lavender helps create a relaxed atmosphere. Exactly what we need for a luau.
QuestTask_ThemeHawaii_9_harvest_seashell: I knew we would find inspiration on the beach! Shelly found some of the most beautiful sea shells I have ever seen in my life. We should collect them before the tide comes in.
Sea shells can be found when harvesting fields and orchards on your main farm
Shelly sees sea shells by the sea shore
QuestTask_ThemeUFO_3_harvest_cow_copy: Pure, untreated milk. Tastes great with cornflakes, too.
QuestTask_ThemeUFO_3_harvest_cow_help: Milk can be harvested from your cowshed or goat stable.
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_10_harvest_wheat_copy: The professor is willing to trade, but he wants some wheat in exchange for the satellite. He said he needed to 'de-steal' more 'ever-noll'. Who knows what he gets up to in that lab of his?
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_11_harvest_milk_copy: These parts have seen better days, but Greta thinks she can patch up the gaps. We just need metal from some milk cans for her to weld.
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_11_harvest_milk_help: Harvest milk from your cowshed or goat stable
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_11_harvest_ufoparts_c: Professor James seems to be sleeping now, I think we've bothered him enough. Maybe if we find some UFO parts, Greta can help us put them back together!
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_11_harvest_ufoparts_h: You can find UFO parts when harvesting your fields and orchards on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_12_harvest_alientrack: I don't see Lester, but there are some strange tracks here on the ground. I didn't make Lester any alien boots though!
You can find strange tracks when harvesting and producing on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_12_harvest_apple_copy: I told Lester to meet me before the twins arrived, but I don't see him. Can you help me clear some apples out of the way and see if we can spot him?
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_12_harvest_apple_help: Harvest apples from orchards on your main farm
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_13_harvest_lavender_c: I don't have any real alien flowers I can give Lana, but I guess Lavender is pretty alien looking, and it smells great!
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_13_harvest_lavender_h: Harvest lavender from the meadows on your flower farm
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_3_harvest_milk_copy: Pure, untreated milk. Tastes great with cornflakes, too.
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_3_harvest_milk_help: Milk can be harvested from your cowshed or goat stable.
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_7_harvest_corn_copy: It seems like quite a few corn fields were damaged with crop circles. Could you help me replace them with some fresh corn stalks?
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_8_harvest_cherry_copy: Lester agreed to dress up as a scary alien, but obviously he doesn't do anything for free. He says he has a sweet tooth, so I guess we can bribe him with some cherries.
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_8_harvest_cherry_titl: Where no man has gone before
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_8_harvest_evidencepho: Oh no! I took some photos of Lester in his alien outfit, but they all blew away! Can you help me collect them before the boys find out what we're up to?
You can find evidence photos when collecting products from stables and processing buildings on your main farm.
QuestTask_ThemeUfo_9_harvest_barley_copy: The professor agreed to help! He can make some fog, but first he said he needs to 'de-steal' some 'ever-noll', at least I think that's what he said...
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_1_donate_citrusfr: And to complete the experience, some citrus fruits would smell great!
Donate citrus fruits from the orchard.
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_1_donate_lavender: First I will need some flowers to make the place look and smell great!
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_1_donate_romantic: Now, some bouquets and a little more variety for the table settings!
Donate some romantic bouquets from the flower shop
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_2_harvest_blackpe: We need to gather pearls, but only the flawless ones will do so we might need to collect a few.
Collect black pearls. You can find them by sending Oleg to the fishing grounds
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_2_harvest_vanilla: The pearls are great! But we need a 'signature scent' for him too perhaps. Vanilla is a sweet but neutral smell, not flowery so perfect for the groom!
Produce vanilla in the meadows on your flower farm.
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_3_donate_aloevera: Perhaps some personalized skin products will do the trick. Tears of joy could make our guests a little puffy under the eye.
Donate aloe vera gel from the distillery.
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_3_donate_pastaham: Pasta gift baskets would be perfect! Country flavor, and pretty to boot!
Donate pasta gift baskets. You can produce them in the flower shop.
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_4_harvest_almonds: Almonds are a great snack, especially those little candy covered ones. I could really go for some candy covered almonds actually...
Produce almonds in an orchard on the gourmet farm.
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_4_harvest_corn_co: Mmm, my sweet tooth is tingling! Well, the one I have left is anyway. But maybe some others prefer a savory snack too. Popcorn can be both! What would Daniel do without me?
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_4_harvest_corn_he: Produce corn on the acres of the main farm.
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_5_donate_almondmu: Wedding cakes are traditional, but these couples are young and modern! They need wedding cupcakes!
Donate almond muffins from the bakery of the gourmet farm.
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_5_harvest_invitat: We need to know who is coming. Time to collect the replies to the invitations.
You can find the invitations as part of all flower farm productions.
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_6_harvest_dove_co: I know there's a flock of doves around the flower farm. See if you can catch a few. Don't worry, we will release them all again!
QuestTask_ThemeWedding_6_harvest_dove_he: You can find doves when harvesting and producing on your flower farm.
QuestTask_VickyDonateCarpBass_donate_bas: We have quite a lot of hungry mouths to feed!
You can find this fish on your main farm or gourmet farm
QuestTask_VickyDonateCarpBass_donate_car: The poor little things! I can almost hear their sad mewing.
You can use the boat to access the locations where this fish can be caught. You have to catch it yourself
QuestTask_VickyFishShrimp_harvest_Shrimp: According to my cookbook, we are going to need some shrimp for my souffle.
Trawl nets are the ideal equipment item for catching shrimp.
QuestTask_adventCalendarIntro_clientActi: Rudolph is very shy. Perhaps he's hiding somewhere in the woods...
Rudolph is hiding somewhere on your farm! Keep your eyes open for a reindeer. When you find it, click on it to complete the task.
QuestTask_candyFarmAirport1_harvest_cand: We don't want to just watch the rides - we want to ride them!
Use the button for exchanging currency in the airport's ring menu to start the currency exchange.
QuestTask_candyFarmAirport2_clientAction: How do you like my idea?
Use the button in the airport's ring menu to go to the candy farm.
QuestTask_candyFarmMoneyExchange_harvest: We don't want to just watch the rides - we want to ride them!
You can exchang currency in the pay booth on the candy farm.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue10_ownObject_candy: Cocoa is a must-have on a candy farm like this. And it can be used in so many ways!
You can find the cocoa tree orchard in the "Production facilities" tab of the construction menu. Building and upgrading cost sugar dollars.
Have a cocoa tree orchard level 1
QuestTask_candyFarmQue11_ownObject_candy: Don't you think their fur looks just like cotton candy?
You can find the alpaca pen in the "Production facilities" tab of the construction menu. Building and upgrading cost sugar dollars.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue12_ownObject_candy: Next time I'll just bring a few lemurs with me. Then we'll see if those feathered fiends dare to come back!
Upgraded production facilities significantly increase the yield.
Have a sweet cherry orchard level 2
QuestTask_candyFarmQue13_ownObject_candy: I'll have to leave the climbing up to you now.
Upgraded production facilities significantly increase the yield.
Have a sweet almond orchard level 2
QuestTask_candyFarmQue14_ownObject_candy: If a good fruit cocktail can put a smile on a face, I'm sure chocolate can do the same!
Upgraded production facilities significantly increase the yield.
Have a cocoa tree orchard level 2
QuestTask_candyFarmQue15_ownObject_candy: We had to upgrade our fields on the island farm to stock up on enough supplies, too.
Upgraded production facilities significantly increase the yield.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue16_ownObject_candy: These fluffy animals need a lot of space to feel comfortable. And we still need some more ingredients!
Upgraded production facilities significantly increase the yield.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue17_ownObject_candy: Our candy palace can't just build itself, of course.
Upgrading the sugar mill costs you time and money, but the higher the upgrade level, the fewer ingredients you need for production.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue18_ownObject_candy: The crushing mill here on the candy farm makes a similar sound, just more powerful.
Upgrading the crushing mill costs you time and money, but the higher the upgrade level, the fewer ingredients you need for production.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue19_ownObject_candy: We need a candy factory like this so we can finish our sweet masterpiece as soon as possible.
Upgrading the candy factory may cost time and money, but it will make candy production much more efficient in the end.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue1_produce_candyFar: I like to take care of the easiest job first, don't you? And you already know all about grapes from the island farm.
You can grow sweet grapes in your sugar fields.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue2_produce_candyFar: Grapes, sweet cherries ... we could use these to make fruit cocktails, too!
Sweet cherries grow in orchards on your candy farm.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue3_expansions_copy: Then we'll be able to come up with some great ideas, don't you think?
QuestTask_candyFarmQue3_expansions_help: By buying a farm expansion, you increase the amount of land on your candy farm and gain new space to build on. Click on the space next to your candy farm to buy an expansion.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue4_ownObject_candyF: You seem to know your way around mills better than I do, so I think it's best if you take on this job.
You can find the sugar mill in the "Processing" tab of the construction menu. Building and upgrading cost sugar dollars.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue5_ownObject_candyF: Let's split the work: you plant the trees and I'll give the sweet almonds a taste test. In my hammock.
You can find the sweet almond orchard in the "Production facilities" tab of the construction menu.
Have a sweet almond orchard level 1
A crushing mill like this one will help us grind down our ingredients. It's a good investment!
You can find the crushing mill in the "Processing" tab of the construction menu.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue6_produce_candyFar: Wow, that job practically did itself. If you're looking for me, I'll be in the bouncy castle.
You can make crushed almonds from sweet almonds in the crushing mill if you have enough ingredients in stock.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue7_ownObject_candyF: When I flip through this recipe collection, it's so hard to pick just one.
You can find the sugar fields in the "Production facilities" tab of the construction menu. Building and upgrading cost sugar dollars.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue8_ownObject_candyF: That worked on the island farm, so why not here?
You can find the composter in the "Processing" tab of the construction menu. Building and upgrading cost sugar dollars.
QuestTask_candyFarmQue9_boostProduction_: Sometimes you have to dare to go where no man has gone before. It will turn out great!
You can make sweet soil in the composter on your candy farm and use it to increase the productivity of your sugar fields.
Use sweet soil on sugar fields
QuestTask_candyFarmQueA_produce_candyFar: Maybe later we can bring in bananas and mangos from the island farm and offer even more flavors!
Fruity delights are made from sweet grapes and sweet cherries in the candy factory on your candy farm.
QuestTask_candyFarmQueB_donateToMonument: The fruity delights make an excellent and sturdy foundation for our candy palace. We can definitely build on them!
Fruity delights are made from sweet grapes and sweet cherries in the candy factory on your candy farm.
Donate fruity delights for the candy palace
QuestTask_candyFarmQueC_donateToMonument: It's not only delicious, it's also firm and easy to mold. An excellent building material.
Marzipan is made from sugar and crushed almonds in the candy factory on your candy farm.
Donate marzipan for the candy palace
QuestTask_candyFarmQueD_donateToMonument: Of course we want to use this exquisite dessert for decorating our candy palace as well!
Chocolate is made from sugar, cocoa powder, and alpaca milk in the candy factory on your candy farm.
Donate chocolate for the candy palace
QuestTask_candyFarmStart_visit_copy: How do you like my idea?
QuestTask_candyFarmStart_visit_help: Enter the candy farm via the world map. Watch out for a location in the bottom left.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy01_harvest_can: I like to take care of the easiest job first, don't you? And you already know all about grapes from the island farm.
You can grow sweet grapes in your sugar fields.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy02_harvest_can: It's time to get some more pasture grass
Pasture grass grows in sugar fields and can be made into alpaca feed in the sugar mill.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy04_harvest_can: Made from pasture grass in the sugar mill and starts production in alpaca pens.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy06_harvest_can: Collect some milk from the alpacas so we can start making candy!
Produced in the alpaca pen and can be processed in the candy factory.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy08_harvest_can: Help me collect some sweet cherries as a snack!
Grow in sweet cherry orchards and can be made into candy in the candy factory.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy09_harvest_can: I'll have to leave the climbing up to you now.
Grow in sweet almond orchards and can be made into crushed almonds in the crushing mill.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy12_harvest_can: The fruity delights make an excellent treat for any season!
Made from sweet cherries and sweet grapes in the candy factory. A wonderfully fruity taste explosion!
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy13_harvest_can: Just two simple ingredients create such a delicious treat. Unbelievable!
Marzipan is made from sugar and crushed almonds in the candy factory on your candy farm.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy17_collectItem: There's always something to do on a farm like this. Let's get our hands dirty!
You can sell your products for vouchers in the event farm management panel.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy18_spend_candy: That's a worthwhile investment into the future of this farm.
The best way to use up your sugar dollars is by building and upgrading buildings.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy19_harvest_can: You can use the bank to easily exchange dollars for sugar dollars that will immediately be available on your farm, but it will take a while before you can exchange dollars again. Upgrading the bank lets you exchange larger amounts of dollars.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy22_sellItem_ca: Why do we have so many fruity delights lying around when we could be trading them for real money?
Made from sweet cherries and grapes in the candy factory. A wonderfully fruity taste explosion!
QuestTask_dailyQuestsCandy24_activateBui: But can we find a few more helpers for the harvest?
Keep an eye on the production times of your fields so that you never miss a harvest.
Start production on a sugar field {0} times
QuestTask_dailyQuestsQuest01_earnReputat: You can win reputation points in missions. But don't worry - you won't lose anything if you don't win!
You can win reputation points and certificates by completing missions. Use them to activate and upgrade your farm machines.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsQuest02_activateFar: Useful helpers like these belong on every farm.
You can find farm machines in the garage next to your farm. They need a few things to be activated, such as certificates earned from playing missions.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic01_harvest_tr: You can never have enough of these in your barn!
You can grow and harvest oranges in your island fields.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic02_harvest_tr: Crunchy peanuts, fresh from shell with a bit of salt on top - I can't imagine anything better!
You can grow and harvest peanuts in your island fields.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic03_harvest_tr: Actually, I'm sure that these ring-tailed thieves would eat anything they could get their hands on!
You can grow and harvest grapes in your island fields.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic04_harvest_tr: You can make peacock feed in the tropical mill from peanuts.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic05_harvest_tr: Hey, where's my watch? Get back here with that!
You can make lemur feed in the tropical mill from grapes.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic06_harvest_tr: So graceful and beautiful - no wonder he'd like to have some of his own!
You can breed peacocks in the peacock coop. They need peacock feed, which is made from peanuts in the tropical mill.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic07_harvest_tr: My friend Nils told me that he has penguins on his farm. Do you think they get along with lemurs?
You can breed lemurs in the lemur pen. They need lemur feed, which is made from grapes in the tropical mill.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic08_harvest_tr: They get fruit and we get fertilizer to grow even more fruit!
Mangos grow in orchards on your island farm.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic09_harvest_tr: So is it called coconut milk or coconut juice now?
You can find coconuts in the orchards on your island farm.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic10_harvest_tr: These bananas are definitely hungry for some sun!
Bananas grow in orchards on your island farm.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic11_activateBu: Work will definitely feel a lot easier now with delicious fruit cocktails in our bellies.
You need fruit from the island farm for fruit cocktails. If you have enough fruit in the barn, you can start production in the beach bar.
Start production in the beach bar {0} times
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic12_harvest_tr: That's why we need at least one juice press in every beach bar.
Orange Fizz requires oranges. You can start production in the beach bar once you have enough fruit in stock.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic13_harvest_tr: Make sure to get the measurements just right.
Summer Slush requires oranges and mangos. You can start production in the beach bar once you have enough fruit in stock.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic14_harvest_tr: You can find me in the hammock!
Fruity Flip requires oranges, mangos, and coconuts. You can start production in the beach bar once you have enough fruit in stock.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic15_harvest_tr: I'm always open to new ways we improve our recipes.
Tropic Star requires oranges, mangos, coconuts, and bananas. You can start production in the beach bar once you have enough fruit in stock.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic16_boostProdu: It's nice when you can get things done so quickly.
Island humus can be made in the composter on the island farm.
Use island humus on your island fields {0} times
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic17_collectIte: Specialized theories like that give me a headache, so I tend to take more of a practical approach to work.
You can earn seashells on the island farm by producing and selling goods or fruit cocktails.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic18_spend_trop: There's no better way to invest your money!
The best way to get rid of your island dollars is by building and upgrading buildings on your island farm.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic19_harvest_tr: I'm especially grateful for your financial support, too!

You can use the island bank to easily exchange dollars for island dollars that will immediately be available on your island farm, but it will take a while before you can exchange dollars again. Upgrading the bank lets you exchange larger amounts of dollars.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic20_sellItem_t: At the end of the day, these beautiful animals are priceless.
The event farm management panel gives you an overview of all your goods. Here you can sell products and get information about their prices.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic21_sellItem_t: Now they can also travel and see a bit of the world!
The event farm management panel gives you an overview of all your goods. Here you can sell products and get information about their prices.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic22_sellItem_t: What good is it to have so much fresh, juicy fruit in stock if you can't sell it as a delicious cocktail?
Orange Fizz requires oranges. Once you have enough fruit in stock, you can start production in the beach bar and then sell the finished cocktails via the event farm management panel.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic23_sellItem_t: I trusted you from the start!
Summer Slush requires oranges and mangos. Once you have enough fruit in stock, you can start production in the beach bar and then sell the finished cocktails via the event farm management panel.
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic24_activateBu: No one wants to work in the field during the hottest time of the day.
Upgraded island fields significantly increase the yield.
Start production on an island field {0} times
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic25_activateBu: But can we find a few more helpers for the harvest?
You can use island fertilizer to grow fruit in your orchards. Island fertilizer is made in the silo from dung.
Use fertilizer on your island orchards {0} times
QuestTask_dailyQuestsTropic26_activateBu: Humans are also supposed to spread their meals out over the day.
You can make feed for lemurs and peacocks in the tropical mill.
Use feed in your island stables {0} times
